Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Pachom and St. Theodore:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt e#y#u# n~dikeoc abba Paqwm va ]koinwnia: nem Yeo~dwroc pefmay/t/cY Po#c# a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of our holy and righteous father, Abba Pachom of the Koinonia, and Theodore his disciple, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
